summary: Completed comprehensive testing of UnTrash Berlin points system updates and medal improvements. All 12 features tested and verified working correctly. Backend API tests: 13 passed. Frontend UI tests: All features working.
seed_data_creation: Test trash reports and area cleanings created during testing for point verification
context_for_next_testing_agent: Points system has been reduced: Report=5pts, Collect=15-25pts, Area=2pts/100m². Medal thresholds: Bronze=30, Silver=75, Gold=150, Platinum=300, Diamond=500. Admin can reset user points via modal in Users tab. Notification system is MOCKED.

feature_1_trash_list_filters_test_data.details: GET /api/trash/list excludes images with 'placeholder', 'test', 'via.placeholder', 'example.com' by default

feature_2_trash_list_include_test_flag.details: GET /api/trash/list?include_test=true returns all reports including test data (for admin use)

feature_3_report_trash_5_points.details: POST /api/trash/report awards 5 points (reduced from 10). Verified points_awarded=5 in response and user points increased by 5

feature_4_collect_trash_15_25_points.details: POST /api/trash/collect/{id} sets points_awarded to 15 (not AI verified) or 25 (AI verified). Reduced from 30-50

feature_5_area_clean_2_per_100sqm.details: POST /api/areas/clean calculates points as 2 per 100m² with minimum 10. 500m²=10pts, 1000m²=20pts. Reduced from 5pts/100m²

feature_6_admin_reset_points_to_zero.details: POST /api/admin/users/{user_id}/reset-points with all zeros resets user points to 0

feature_7_admin_reset_points_custom.details: POST /api/admin/users/{user_id}/reset-points can set custom values for total, monthly, weekly points

feature_8_admin_reset_points_clear_medal.details: POST /api/admin/users/{user_id}/reset-points with clear_medals=true clears all user medals

feature_9_medal_thresholds_updated.details: Medal thresholds verified: Bronze=30, Silver=75, Gold=150, Platinum=300, Diamond=500. All thresholds tested via point manipulation

feature_10_admin_panel_reset_button.details: AdminPanel Users tab shows 'Reset Points' button for non-admin users. Button opens modal with all fields

feature_11_profile_animated_medals.details: Profile page shows MedalCard components with gradient backgrounds, shimmer animation, glow effects, and bounceIn animation for new medals

feature_12_profile_progress_bars.details: Profile page shows 'This Month's Progress' section with progress bars for all 5 medal tiers showing updated thresholds (30/75/150/300/500)

frontend_ui_tests.reset_points_modal: PASSED - Shows Total/Monthly/Weekly inputs, Clear medals checkbox, Reset All to Zero button, Save Changes button
frontend_ui_tests.profile_medal_cards: PASSED - Shows gradient medal cards with shimmer animation
frontend_ui_tests.profile_progress_bars: PASSED - Shows progress for all 5 medal tiers with correct thresholds
frontend_ui_tests.medal_animation_overlay: PASSED - Shows 'MEDAL Earned!' animation with bounceIn effect

mocked_apis_note: Notification system is MOCKED - Email and push notifications are logged to console and stored in mock_notifications collection
